parameters.name: Page
parameters.description: Pointer to a CDialog object cast to a long

title: ILightDialog.AddSubDialog
description: Adds a sub-dialog to the lighting dialog.

parameters.name: Page
parameters.description: Pointer to a CDialog object cast to a long

returns: True if the dialog was successfully added, false if not
remarks: Currently only one sub-dialog can be added to each dialog.
